means: 给人印象深刻的，感人的

sentence.Network_en: India while not racking up such an impressive score beat Japan 3-0.
sentence.Network_cn: 印度尽管没有大胜，却也以3比0击败了日本。

sentence.Network_en: He was well-built, but too fleshy to be impressive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他肌肉发达，但是太胖了，没给人留下好印象。

sentence.Network_en: The thoroughness of the evaluation process we went through was impressive.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们亲历的评估过程面面俱到，给人留下了深刻印象。

entry.tran: 给人深刻印象的;不俗的;了不起的
entry.def: Something that is impressive impresses you, for example because it is great in size or degree, or is done with a great deal of skill.

example.tran: 那是一项了不起的成就。

example.ex: The film's special effects are particularly impressive.
example.tran: 那部电影的特技效果尤其令人赞叹。

means.word_mean: 1. making a strong or vivid impression;

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's impressive but it's not that remarkable.

auth_sentence.content: She's equally impressive on the more difficult stuff.

auth_sentence.content: There's plenty of players who were impressive today.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

Sentence.sentence: At first glance Inkling is an impressive experience.

means.word_mean: 给人印象深刻的, 感人的

sentences.en: The first ceremony which we went into college is an impressive ceremony.
sentences.cn: 我们进入大学的第一次典礼给我们的印象很深。

sentences.en: This cinema is so impressive that we can't help crying.
sentences.cn: 这影片如此感人以至我们禁不住流下泪来。

jushi.english: The first ceremony which we went into college is an impressive ceremony.
jushi.chinese: 我们进入大学的第一次典礼给我们的印象很深。
